data.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
data.author: John Wooden

data.quote: Attitude is a choice. Happiness is a choice. Optimism is a choice. Kindness is a choice. Giving is a choice. Respect is a choice. Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: The only way of discovering the limits of the possible is to venture a little way past them into the impossible.
data.author: Arthur C. Clarke

data.quote: Without ambition one starts nothing. Without work one finishes nothing. The prize will not be sent to you. You have to win it.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: Circumstances are the rulers of the weak; they are but the instruments of the wise.
data.author: Samuel Lover

data.quote: Although the world is full of suffering, it is full also of the overcoming of it.
data.author: Helen Keller

data.quote: Do not stop thinking of life as an adventure. You have no security unless you can live bravely, excitingly, imaginatively; unless you can choose a challenge instead of competence.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.
data.author: Napoleon Hill

data.quote: Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
data.author: William James

data.quote: Rejection is an opportunity for your selection.
data.author: Bernard Branson

data.quote: You are essentially who you create yourself to be and all that occurs in your life is the result of your own making.
data.author: Stephen Richards

data.quote: Keep in mind that the true measure of an individual is how he treats a person who can do him absolutely no good.
data.author: Ann Landers

data.quote: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: Focus on making choices to lead your life that aligns with your core values in the most purposeful way possible.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Stop blaming outside circumstances for your inside chaos.
data.author: Steve Maraboli

data.quote: Being defeated is often a temporary condition. Giving up is what makes it permanent.
data.author: Marilyn vos Savant

data.quote: You make mistakes, mistakes don't make you.
data.author: Maxwell Maltz

data.quote: Whether you know or not, you are the infinite potential of love, peace and joy.
data.author: Amit Ray

data.quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.
data.author: Criss Jami
